LanguageData.VDE_EnableAwakeningDesc: Turn three dryads of a type into an awakened version that is free from the trees. This new awakened dryad will act as a normal animal of the colony in most aspects.
LanguageData.VDE_ConnectionStrengthTooWeakForAwakenin: Connection strength too low to create an awakening cocoon.
LanguageData.VDE_TurnIntoPalmDesc: Evolves the dryad into an ambrosia palm that produces the drug periodically
